climatePledgeFriendly.details: ECOLOGO certified products meet standards that can reduce the environmental impact of one or more stages of the product lifecycle. EWG Verified products are reviewed to ensure they are free from EWG’s known chemicals of concern and adhere to strict health standards.

features: EWG VERIFIED: Clean ingredients and full transparency
INGREDIENTS OF NATURAL ORIGIN : Formulated with 97.9% naturally sourced ingredients* including soy protein to enhance shine and volume
HIGH PERFORMANCE : Enriched with watercress and Indian cress, known for their high mineral and vitamin content
body.description: Formulated with 97.9% naturally sourced ingredients*, the vegan Volume and shine shampoo gives your hair a boost. It features soy protein to enhance shine and volume and cranberry extract to keep hair healthy looking and radiant. EWG VERIFIED, vegan and dermatologically tested, this hair care essential is enriched with watercress and Indian cress extract to strengthen and revitalize hair. Let your hair infuse with a floral fragrance with orange blossom and eucalyptus notes. Get even more dazzling results with the Volume and shine conditioner! Try this new hair care routine.* According to ISO 16128.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Superior, non-toxic ingredients, shiny hair, great aroma
reviews.reviewText: This shampoo is superb for several reasons. #1, it is EWG Verfied, which means that the ingredients are about as benign as you can get. This is why I decided to try it in the first place. I am extremely sensitive and often allergic to fragrances, so I am pleased to report I did not have a problem with the fragrances used in this product. In fact, I love the scent—lightly citrusy with undertones of vanilla, reminiscent of Jean Naté, but with more vanilla notes. Not overwhelming! Yet so nice, it smells edible.It rinses out easily, which is another thing I usually have trouble with. After shampooing my hair, which tangles easily and is very hard to comb out, I usually condition it and then, while the conditioner is still in my hair, I comb out the tangles using a wide tooth comb/pick. What I noticed was that after using this stuff, I did not lose much hair combing it out. That’s a plus I wasn’t expecting.I did not see much in the way of volumizing—sorry, but what I do see is that it makes my hair very shiny and unusually nice looking. I’ll take it! This shampoo is extremely light, which is important in volumizing hair, or at least not going in the opposite direction. Because it is so light, it does not weigh down my hair or cause it to clump together.My hair type is extremely fine, a notch above baby fine hair, rather thin, and longish. It tends to look oily the day after I wash it, so I appreciate how easy this shampoo is to rinse out—otherwise hair care would take too much time. This shampoo is slightly gold in hue, but transparent. The transparency makes it hard to see how much of it I’m pouring into my palm, but I would estimate it’s the diameter of a Kennedy dollar, if you remember how big that is! Perhaps that’s a 1.5 inch diameter. I don’t feel like I’m having to use oodles of this stuff to get my hair fully clean. On day two after washing it fully, I have been able to use a very tiny amount on my fingertips to clean the roots of my bangs and hairline. My hair still looks clean afterward and the shampoo does not seem to dry it out.In summary, this is a high-quality, non-toxic shampoo with the nicest fragrance I’ve ever smelled in a hair product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s very pure & free of any toxic ingredients
reviews.reviewText: I have been doing a lot of research on products that have non toxic ingredients. It was shocking to me how many do have them. This had a very high rating for purity on the Yuka app. I also like the smell and this along with the conditioner made my hair really shiny & soft

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My fav shampoo!
reviews.reviewText: I love the texture, the smell, and the way it makes my hair feel, but most importantly I love the ingredients and that it’s so natural! I have naturally oily hair and I can only go two days max without washing, so I’m glad I don’t have to worry about constantly using this on my scalp! And it’s a great price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great product, redesign the packaging
reviews.reviewText: A+ for actual product. No dyes. No sulfates, etc. Cleans hair well.Take it out of the boxed wine design. Using it with the spigot at the bottom as designed relies on gravity and air pressure to make the shampoo flow and that's super slow. You have to open up the box and use a third hand to apply more pressure to refill in-shower containers within a realistic time frame. Additionally the spigot drips because again the shampoo is viscose and doesn't move through fast so I have to store it upside down. Additionally while the box might provide some protection in storage, as you use up the product you end up wasting storage space. Save some cardboard, some heavy plastics with the spigot and move to a bag and small nozzle in the upper corner design like the other bulk shampoo guys. This design is not worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very high end!
reviews.reviewText: The scent is very subtle, it gets great ratings for clean ingredients and performs very well! I noticed a difference in my hair after the first use. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pure perfection, clean ingredients
reviews.reviewText: What sets this shampoo apart is its commitment to clean living. Free from harsh chemicals, sulfates, and parabens, the ingredient list reads like a wholesome recipe for happy and healthy hair. The inclusion of natural extracts and botanical wonders not only cleanses but also enriches my hair, leaving it feeling revitalized with each wash. It is a gentle formula that helps with hair strength without stripping any essential oils.The shampoo arrived with the top leaking and broken but I am using it anyway. That is no fault of the brand, but only the deliverer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the smell! & I can use it with my kids because its safe!!
reviews.reviewText: I personally love when I do not have to buy a separate product for my kids!We try to keep toxins at a minimum around here and that means using EWG's rating system to figure out what household and beauty products are the safest and im usually looking for a good price:cleanliness ratio. The ATTITUDE line of shower products are all so clean that I can buy it and use for myself and my kids without worrying.It makes travel easier too when I can pack sharable toiletries

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Shampoo leaked during shipping.
reviews.reviewText: Shampoo leaked during shipping. Packaging was not adequate. I liked the scent and how my hair felt after using it, but I am allergic to something in this shampoo because my scalp got itchy and had bumps after using it.

***** 5 Stars: A Game-Changer for My Hair! *****Oh. My. Goodness! Where do I even begin with this natural shampoo?! Let me just say that this product has completely transformed my hair care routine, and I am beyond ecstatic with the results!First and foremost, I am a huge advocate for natural products. So, when I stumbled upon this fabulous shampoo, I knew I had to give it a try. And boy, am I glad I did! From the moment I opened the bottle, I was greeted with the most refreshing and invigorating scent of natural botanicals. The formula is simply divine! It lathers up beautifully, creating a luxurious and creamy foam that gently cleanses my hair without stripping it of its natural oils. I've struggled with dry and frizzy hair for years, but after just a few uses, I noticed a remarkable difference. My locks are now softer, shinier, and more manageable than ever before. I can't stop running my fingers through my hair!The best part? This shampoo is free from harsh chemicals and nasty sulfates. It's enriched with the goodness of nature, packed with nourishing ingredients like aloe vera, coconut oil, and essential oils. My hair feels so much healthier and happier now that it's receiving the care it truly deserves.I also appreciate the eco-friendly packaging. As someone who cares deeply about the environment, it's essential to me that I support brands that share the same values. This shampoo checks all the boxes when it comes to sustainability, and that makes me even happier to have it in my daily routine.Did I mention the compliments I've been receiving? Seriously, people have been asking me what magical potion I'm using on my hair because it looks so amazing! I proudly tell them about this natural shampoo and encourage them to experience the wonders it brings.In conclusion, if you're on the hunt for a game-changer in your hair care journey, look no further! This natural shampoo is a true gem, and I cannot recommend it enough. Treat yourself and your lovely locks to the nourishing, revitalizing magic of this product, and you'll be forever grateful. I know I am!Thank you, thank you, THANK YOU to the brilliant minds behind this remarkable creation. My hair has found its new best friend, and I couldn't be happier! I'll definitely be a loyal customer for life. ❤️
No me agrado como me dejo el pelo , decía volumen y no me dio el volumen , me lo dejo sin cuerpo y muy lacio

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This brand has been recommended by many because of the quality ingredients and non toxic products! This shampoo is not only non toxic but it's amazing quality! The price is incredibly reasonable and the smell is AMAZING! I wasn't sure what scent to expect with the advertised scent but this did not disappoint!

reviews.reviewTitle: Good Product but not so good delivery
reviews.reviewText: Love this shampoo as much as the other range i bought from Attitude. But the box is damaged upon arrival. Well it didn't affect the quality though.

This is a really great smelling and effective shampoo. I had originally ordered a bottle of Phillip Adam's Orange Vanilla shampoo and didn't find it sudsed well or cleaned very well, even though it is quite expensive. I then came across this brand of shampoo and recognized it as the same brand as my hand soap which I love. The smell is exactly like The Body Shop's 'satsuma' line. My hair tends to get greasy after a couple days, but this shampoo has been keeping it clean for a little longer. It does add volume, shine, and leaves my hair soft not dry feeling. I like it so much I ordered another bottle right away. They do also put a stick on the pump so it doesn't leak while being shipped.
